alert.note: Alert for Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Salt Basin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 5:36PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Otero and north central Hudspeth Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 436 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles north of Cornudas, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dell City, Cornudas and Cornudas Mountains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Salt Basin
